Title: Day 443
Writer: Phil Alden Robinson (created by), Michelle King (created by), Robert King (created by), Jacquelyn Reingold, Tegan Shohet (story editor)
Actors: Christine Baranski, Cush Jumbo, Rose Leslie, Sarah Steele
Plot: Adrian becomes an overnight celebrity after his candid appearance on a cable news show goes viral. Lucca, who has yet to formally announce her pregnancy, worries about her future at the firm.
